name: .DWFX File Extension
summary: Learn about .DWFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A DWFX file is a 2D or 3D drawing created with Autodesk CAD software. It is saved in the DWFx format, which is similar to a .DWF file, but is formatted using Microsoft's XML Paper Specification (XPS). DWFX files may contain 3D design data, object properties, and metadata.

content: DWFx files can be viewed with Autodesk Design Review or AutoCAD 2009. They can also be opened using Microsoft's XPS Viewer, which is included with Windows Vista.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
